name: @emdgroup/react-auth
description: React hooks implementing the Authorization Code Grant Flow with PKCE.

scripts.docs:build: rm -rf docs README.md && typedoc --hideInPageTOC --excludeNotDocumented --disableSources --theme github-wiki src/index.tsx
scripts.docs: npm run docs:build && ts-node ../../bin/merge-docs Exports.md UserContext.md ProviderOptions.md LoginOptions.md UserSession.md UserInfo.md
scripts.prepack: npm run docs && rm -rf dist && tsc --build --force

author: Moritz Onken <onken@netcubed.de>
